Articles.Content:
I was fortunate enough to live under the shuttle's landing path for many years. Got to see a lot of reentries, which were especially pretty at night. Yay! But also had to spend 2 weeks picking pieces of Columbia.....

Well that had to suck

Edited August 19, 2014 by Starwaster
Because WTH KSP Forum???

It's like B9... But unlike B9 it might actually install properly and not just give me 2 landing gear, a few fuel tanks and a single wing (so much for 700MB or something within that order of magnitude)

I will be installing, because it has that stock feel, like that stock expansion pack (~0.20, I think) that had the exact same stock like look but added so much more, and has been partially integrated into the game (not the actual useful bits, like the radial fuel and oxidiser tanks, 0.625m reaction wheels ect), I hope this is also the fate of this mod (minus the partial integration bit)

It's like B9... But unlike B9 it might actually install properly and not just give me 2 landing gear, a few fuel tanks and a single wing (so much for 700MB or something within that order of magnitude)

That's actually up to you, and not the parts pack. So a hearty good luck seems to be in order. Good luck!

This is becoming stock! Check it out! Congratulations, Porkjet

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91100-Devnote-Tuesdays-The-Can-t-Spell-Kerbal-without-K-Edition?p=1361329

Edited August 20, 2014 by Woopert
Congrats on the Stock-ification! It's good to see that stockalike modding is still making its way into the base game.

Awwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwww yeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!!!!!

About time the Mk2 line got a stock overhaul! Congrats Porkchop!
WOW! congrats on the mod integration into stock KSP Porkjet! I mean that is above and beyond. I do hope that they keep the cargo bays in there.
Got to admit, the news of SP+ being integrated into stock KSP worries me. I hope these "modifications" they mention don't cause Porkjet to move away from his vision for the future of this mod.
Congrats Porkjet. Always thought you're work should be stock.
A big congrats on your work making it to stock! MOAR spaceplanes!
Congrats on this being integrated Porkjet! Your work deserves to be stock.

Congrats Porkjet, I had a feeling this would be the one they were talking about, it fits so well, just filling in the gaps without adding lots of unnecessary parts.

I couldn't be more chuffed about their choice
Congrats man! Any hint about cargo bays? Would they be added also?

Got to admit, the news of SP+ being integrated into stock KSP worries me. I hope these "modifications" they mention don't cause Porkjet to move away from his vision for the future of this mod.

IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m also not very happy. Not what I personally hoped for in any way.

Hope they at least donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t mess up this nice pack.

As I said before, parts improve the existing game while plugins extend it (roughly speaking) and so I think SQUAD should include plugins and let parts to the modding community. Well, I seem to be quite alone with my opinion so IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll shut up.

Anyway, congrats Porkjet, you did great work and since you once mentioned that you also rely on the financial ROI of your mods (donations until now) I also hope you got a nice share from SQUAD.

This is becoming stock! Check it out! Congratulations, Porkjet

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91100-Devnote-Tuesdays-The-Can-t-Spell-Kerbal-without-K-Edition?p=1361329

Yay! Congrats, Porkjet; thoroughly deserved. You raised the bar.

Congrats! It will be great to see these in the stock game. Also, the cargo bays should only need to be set up again in unity to use stock animations correct? so they won't depend on firespitter anymore?

Grats, that stuff really deserves into KSP. Might make some off the older stock stuff lock bad, though.^^

On a different note, will you continue to create new plane-part's? MK3 does look a bit sad. *hint, hint*

Edited August 20, 2014 by Temeter

Greats Porkjet! These are some of the finest, sleekest, sharpest looking parts I've come across

(I'm also hoping the cargo bays made it in, biohazard15. That would be excellent)

Greats Porkjet! These are some of the finest, sleekest, sharpest looking parts I've come across

(I'm also hoping the cargo bays made it in, biohazard15. That would be excellent)

I wonder if Hugo was working on a MkIII cargo bay...
Congratulations, Porkjet!
Congratulations Porkjet! I'm only a tad jealous

Jumin' on the Grats Train!

Congrats Porkjet! I've had your spaceplane parts for a while, glad to see ya get the recognition

http://youtu.be/oyFQVZ2h0V8

Great news and great parts

The stock game was in dire need of these parts! I just never thought that they would actually make it into the game!

Congrats!
I can see Squad annexing KW or some other large rocket part pack in the near future. They're nearing scope-completion, so now they're starting to worry about assets, which are still quite lacking.
